title: Arise, Arise, the Day Is Near
verses:
Arise, arise, the day is near,
When Christ shall come in power;
The signs of heaven do appear,
This is the accepted hour.

The fig tree putteth forth her leaves,
The summer is at hand;
The faithful soul that truth receives
Shall in the kingdom stand.

O sleeper, wake! the night is gone,
The morning breaks apace;
Arise, put on salvation's dawn,
And seek the Savior's face.

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Passionate appeal for immediate spiritual preparation based on prophetic signs
